message: Let's start with a small difference, can you do better?
Let's split it down the middle, a fair start
You said it's a fair start, now it's time to make it worth my while!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect it to get much better
You said it wouldn't get much better, but I'm willing to give you a chance to prove it!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give in too much
You're not giving in, but I'm not giving up either. Let's meet in the middle... sort of.
I'll give you a better deal, but I'm not going to give away too much
It's time to split the difference for real. Will you finally meet me halfway?
